text: Australia Next Data Centre / Insulated Panels Rainspan panels and Recess Fixed Cassettes
title: Data Centre Solutions
desc: Globally, there is considerable planned investment in data centre infrastructure to support the forecast growth in data consumption and cloud computing. For example, Ireland is a key data centre market in Europe. At the end of 2019 it had 53 operational data centres, eight more under construction and 26 with planning approval.
